description: I am a very loving person, emotional, sensitive, good nature, giving, affectionate, God fearing woman. I have had a couple of long term relationships throughout the years and I know how to treat a woman right. I have a lot to give and I still have a lot to learn about God's ways in dealing with a relationship. I want to be with a woman who desires to learn what it takes to have a successful Christ centred marriage because I am learning myself. Maybe we could learn together???
